xml_validator_view_invalid_file: Invalid file selected. Please choose an XML file.
xml_validator_view_upload_xml_files: Upload XML files and perform validations
xml_validator_view_upload_xsd_files: Upload XSD schema files and use them to validate your XML data
xml_validator_view_xml_description: XML (eXtensible Markup Language) is an extensible markup language used to represent and structure data in a formatted text format.
xml_validator_view_xsd_description: XSD (XML Schema Definition) is a standardized language written in XML used to define the structure and format of XML documents.
xml_validator_view_drag_drop_xml: It is not possible to insert XSD files into the XML text field.
xml_validator_view_drag_drop_xsd: It is not possible to insert XML files into the XSD text field.
